summary: On the request of his friend Kabir, SP Adil Sends him to the Naxal group as an informer. When Kabir finds the truth he becomes one of their gang leader.
cast: Arjun Rampal|Abhay Deol|Manoj Bajpayee|Esha Gupta|Om Puri|Kabir Bedi|Deep Raj Rana|Singh Bhupesh|Harsh Mainra|Vinay Apte|Radha Krishna Dutt|Kamal Jain|Amit Jairath|Kiran Karmarkar|Anjali Patil|Murli Sharma|Jagat Singh|Tanvir Singh|Pradeep Verma|Sandeep Yadav
title: Chakravyuh
